Electrical & Embedded
Joon Koh
Explore

Interests


Make things work

Workstation, Circuit Analysis, Oscilloscope, Programming language, Integrated Development Environment, Datasheet, Manual, are tools and ideas to solve problems. Always, tools acquired from past experiences are not enough to face new challenges. So, learning learning learning, never stop. The great joy will come when the things work!

Hardware

Building a device with own idea is something worth spending time for. To accomplish the task, it requires technical knowledge in circuit, PCB, architectures, design rules, sensors and actuators. Having a team with solid communication is often the key to success.

Programming

Teaching device to do what we want requires programming language. Hardware is superb in following procedures that takes input, logically manipulates it, and output data we expected. However, this is different from human programmers thinking. Object-oriented programming fills this gap. It makes programmers focus on objects and means to manipulate them. Though C/C++ is bugged with undefined behaviors, they are simple and fast!

About


Joon Koh obtained B.S. from University of Malaya and M.S. from University of Pennsylvania both in Electrical Engineering.

He enjoys solving problems and making things happen. After few years of working in Texas Instrument and Huawei Technologies, he learned that technical work is the thing he wants to do for the rest of his life, so he decided to go to United States. He experienced in trasistor level and PCB level circuit design, but his core interest lies in hardware and software interface, i.e. embedded system.

When there is relax time, He likes to play chess and piano. He can play songs for you and if you doesn't like, just challenge him on chess.

Email: joonyi2011@gmail.com    Collaborate: Github    Network: LinkedIn

Digital Integrated Circuit/VLSI

Cadence Virtuoso

With current technology, a computer microship contains hundreds of thousands of transistor, hence Very Large Integrated Circui, VLSI. There are many hierarchies and levels of abstractionin VLSI design. They range from high-level system design to transistor-level circuit layout

Electronic design automation.

Full details can be found on the GNU Radio wiki

Wearable Gunshot Detector

PCB design & Coding

under construction

Being new to GNU Radio at the time, I created tutorial 2 (GRC) and tutorial 3 (python) as I was most able to relate to other beginners. I went a little overboard and even got parts of my tutorials in the Extras section (E1)!

The news are on Penn News

Intrabody Communication

PCB design

under construction

Students liked the simplicity of it and the hands on experience but wished I had written a manual so they can revisit it later when they work on more complex designs. A github wiki page is on the TODO.

A completed project, bill of materials, and library can be found in the wireless repo.

Kinematic Lute

Mechatronic Instrument

under construction

The project involved messing with ALSA to allow mixing, playing with NeoPixel leds so we can easily control 53 LEDs independently with a single micro, and making a startup routine to run the music playing code. I wrote the code for the AVR's and the BBB, designed the schematics, and wrote it all up on the wiki.

The full details can be found on the github wiki page

Heart Rate Monitor

Embedded System

under construction

I am the tech lead responsible for architecting the electronics and software. I have designed circuits in kicad (truly open source hardware) and redesigned a few to make them mass manufacturable. I wrote a recipe for openembedded to build our custom linux distribution and helped develop ideas for mechanical systems and entrepreneurship plans.

This project is still under heavy development at the surveycorps

I was responsible for creating the schematic and writing the wiki.

Access Network Engineer

Huawei Technologies

The job responsility is to deal with the telecommunication equipment above, which is called IPSLAM (Internet Protocol Digital Subscriber Line Access Multiplexer). The internet and landline telephone service that go out from your house will get connected into this IPDSLAM, so that you can access the network and connect to the world. It is basically an UNIX system!

An IP DSLAM was the first pairing of a DSLAM with either an IP card that assists with the management and operation of the multiple service access traffic associated with subscribe lines up to the notion of an integrated on board interface that was expressly proving IP for uplink and often with some (limited) IP routing capabilities.

Our team is responsible to install and maintain this equipment. Other words, whenver users have problem on internet and telephone, we have to solve their problems.

New Product Engineer

Texas Instrument

New Product Engineer is responsible to qualify the new integrated circuit that has been released by RND team.
